channel.title: Range to melee problem
channel.description: when ever i switch from range to melee, melee starts hitting numbers really fast meanwhile showing arrows. Help will be appreciated

item.title: Range to melee problem
item.dc:creator: @RuneRemix RuneRemix
item.description:
@RuneRemix wrote:

Yes i know people have fixed this on pimpscape before, with the cbow.
If somone could help that would be great, heres a little more info.
Before you range, melee works fine.
When you range, range works fine.
Then when you unequip your weapon or equip a different weapon,
(except a bow) because if you switch to a bow it works fine.
But if it has to do with melee, it starts mass hitting, even though you can still
see the bow animation and arrows flying.

Thanks if somone helps you will be much appreciated.

Read full topic
